directions: Stir some smooth canned pumpkin along with a pinch of pumpkin pie spice and a drizzle of sweetener (honey, agave, maple syrup) into the plain yogurt,
ingredients: ½ cup non-fat regular yogurt (go Greek for extra protein!)
1 teaspoon maple syrup or other sweetener
a pinch of pumpkin pie spice (optional)
title: Pumpkin Yogurt with Granola
